Body:
So, I am trying to set up a Google Cloud Network using Terraform. I am following the guide by Dan Isla who is a Google Cloud Solution Architect (URL: https://cloud.google.com/community/tutorials/managing-gcp-projects-with-terraform).

I am stuck at the part where I have to set the environment variables TF_VAR_org_id and TF_VAR_billing_account. I looked for them on the console but didn't have any luck. I also tried the following commands as suggested in the guide but I get a permission-denied error.

gcloud organizations list
gcloud beta billing accounts list

What do you suggest I do to fix this problem?
Title: How to set google cloud environment variables (TF_VAR_org_id and TF_VAR_billing_accountHEy )?

comments.Text: Looks like you do not have enough permissions, you need to talk with the Organization Administrator. Who should have access to the billing account and the organization ID

filtered-sentences.text: Who should have access to the billing account and the organization ID

comments.Text:
The command that you are using to get the organization ID is correct.
    gcloud organizations list

Here is the command to get he billing account ID:
    gcloud beta billing accounts list

filtered-sentences.text: Here is the command to get he billing account ID: gcloud beta billing accounts list

So, I am trying to set up a Google Cloud Network using Terraform. I am following the guide by Dan Isla who is a Google Cloud Solution Architect (URL: https://cloud.google.com/community/tutorials/managing-gcp-projects-with-terraform). 

I am stuck at the part where I have to set the environment variables "TF_VAR_org_id" and "TF_VAR_billing_account". I looked for them on the console but didn't have any luck. I also tried the  following commands as suggested in the guide but I get a permission-denied error (picture attached).
*gcloud organizations list
gcloud beta billing accounts list*

What do you suggest I do to fix this problem?[enter image description here][1]


  [1]: https://i.stack.imgur.com/5G5MG.png

filtered-sentences.text: *gcloud organizations list gcloud beta billing accounts list*
